function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate HVAC systems contributing to COVID-19 transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of virus spread in indoor environments","Mitigation":"Improvement of HVAC systems with efficient filtration and purification techniques","Technologies":"HEPA filters, air ionization, bipolar ionization, airPHX, germicidal ultraviolet, UVGI, UV light purifiers","People":"Occupants of indoor environments","Owner":"Building administrators, facility managers"},{"Description":"Harmful effects of UV rays on humans","Impact":"Risk of harm from prolonged exposure to UV rays","Mitigation":"Use of UVGI technology and UV light purifiers when rooms are not occupied","Technologies":"UVGI, UV light purifiers with safe UV wavelengths","People":"Occupants of indoor environments","Owner":"Building administrators, facility managers"},{"Description":"Indoor air quality as a strategic concern during COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased attention and focus on indoor air quality and ventilation systems","Mitigation":"Development of sustainable residential building with natural ventilation and improved IREQ","Technologies":"Natural ventilation systems, improved IREQ standards","People":"Building designers, architects, developers","Owner":"Real estate developers, building owners"}]}
